Validate device ID, authentication key, and middleware key<br></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fontFamily=Verdana;fillColor=#191C20;fontColor=#d7d8db;strokeColor=#3385FF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="-280" width="240" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jZypnUsxnUaBHJbJEt-M-49" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.25;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;align=center;fontFamily=Verdana;strokeColor=#3385FF;" parent="1" source="jZypnUsxnUaBHJbJEt-M-51" target="jZypnUsxnUaBHJbJEt-M-48" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="640" y="-250" /> <mxPoint x="640" y="-250" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jZypnUsxnUaBHJbJEt-M-50" value="<div>12.
